nodes.text: The Black Nebula was a nebula located in the Colonies, in a region of space known as Parfadi.

The Black Nebula separated the planets Arat Fraca and Motexx. It contained two supermassive neutron stars, making travel in the nebula impossible. The nebula was a hideout for rogue starship outfitters during the Galactic Civil War. Crimson Jack was known to swear by the Black Nebula.
